DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether contact lens wear improve child 's self-perceptions spectacle wear .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Contact Lens Wear Children 's Self-Perceptions
DOC.detailed_description: Eight eleven year old child randomly assign wear spectacle soft contact lens . The child 's self-perceptions measure baseline every six month . We compare change self-perception spectacle soft contact lens wearer three year . We also examine effect much child initially like dislike wear glass change self-perception three year .
